Title: Telethon
Plot: Leslie hosts a late-night shift for a local telethon, and lands former Indiana Pacer Detlef Schrempf as a celebrity guest. Meanwhile, Mark has big plans for his relationship with Ann.
GuestStars: Andy Milder, Jim O'Heir, Retta, Mo Collins, Jim Meskimen, Detlef Schrempf, Kirk Fox
